segments.text: I'm observing the woman at the sink, and it's quite perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, meticulously drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is absolutely pouring over the front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a significant puddle right where she's standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she shows no sign of noticing anything amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world, seen through the window, looks so calm and perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos brewing inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry about the inevitable mess this will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water damage to the cabinets and floor will be extensive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just heartbreaking to see her so engrossed, while disaster looms.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to look down, just for a moment!
segments.speaker: PAR
